思路: // @Title: 下一个更大元素 I (Next Greater Element I) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-06-24 17:54:46 // @Runtime: 3 ms // @Memory: 43.5 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int[] nextGreaterElement(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) { LinkedList<Integer> stack=new LinkedList<>(); Map<Integer,Integer> map=new HashMap<>(); for(int i=0;i<nums2.length;i++){ int max=-1; while(!stack.isEmpty()&&stack.peek()<nums2[i]){ int old= stack.pop(); //寻找右侧大就是被弹出时要插入的那个值 map.put(old,nums2[i]); } stack.push(nums2[i]); } int[] res=new int[nums1.length]; for(int i=0;i<nums1.length;i++){ int value=map.getOrDefault(nums1[i],-1); res[i]=value; } return res; } } +++ title = “下一个更大元素 I (Next Greater Element I)” draft = false +++
